<center>

*Sincerity with Aspiration, Perseverance with Integrity*

</center>

The **ML Compendium** introduces a complete data analysis pipeline from obtaining, validating, transforming, visualizing, modeling and reporting data using modern machine learning approaches using R.  

```{r autor_table, echo=FALSE}
library(gt)

authors <- tibble::tribble(
  ~Name,          ~`Student nr`,  ~School,                  ~Signature,
  "Donald",       "MG20145007", "Information Management", "Donald.png",
  "Huang Yuqiao", "MG21150024", "Business",               "HuangYuQiao.png",
  "Gu Rongna",    "DG21020005", "Business",               "GuRongNa.png",
  "Ji Jie",       "DG21020010", "Business",               "JiJie.png",
  "Wang Ying",    "DG21020042", "Business",               "WangYing.png"
)

authors |>
  gt() |>
  text_transform(
    locations = cells_body(Signature),
    fn = function(x) {
      local_image(
        filename = paste0("assets/images/sigs/", x),
        height = 60
      )
    }
  ) |>
  tab_style(
    location = cells_column_labels(),
    style = list(
      cell_borders(sides = "bottom", weight = px(3)),
      cell_text(weight = "bold")
    )
  ) |>
  cols_align("center") |>
  cols_label(Signature = "") |>
  tab_options(
    column_labels.border.top.color = "transparent",
    table.border.top.color = "transparent"
  )
```

